name: Windows x64 VNC Server (Reflective Injection), Windows x64 Reverse HTTPS Stager (winhttp)
author: sf <stephen_fewer@harmonysecurity.com>
OJ Reeves
description: Inject a VNC Dll via a reflective loader (Windows x64) (staged). Tunnel communication over HTTPS (Windows x64 winhttp)

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: HandlerSSLCert
options.description: Path to a SSL certificate in unified PEM format

options.name: LHOST
options.description: The local listener hostname

options.name: LPORT
options.description: The local listener port

options.name: ReverseListenerBindPort
options.description: The port to bind to on the local system if different from LPORT

options.name: ReverseAllowProxy
options.description: Allow reverse tcp even with Proxies specified. Connect back will NOT go through proxy but directly to LHOST

options.name: PingbackRetries
options.description: How many additional successful pingbacks

options.name: PingbackSleep
options.description: Time (in seconds) to sleep between pingbacks

options.name: PayloadUUIDSeed
options.description: A string to use when generating the payload UUID (deterministic)

options.name: PayloadUUIDRaw
options.description: A hex string representing the raw 8-byte PUID value for the UUID

options.name: PayloadUUIDName
options.description: A human-friendly name to reference this unique payload (requires tracking)

options.name: PayloadUUIDTracking
options.description: Whether or not to automatically register generated UUIDs

options.name: EnableStageEncoding
options.description: Encode the second stage payload

options.name: StageEncoder
options.description: Encoder to use if EnableStageEncoding is set

options.name: StageEncoderSaveRegisters
options.description: Additional registers to preserve in the staged payload if EnableStageEncoding is set

options.name: StageEncodingFallback
options.description: Fallback to no encoding if the selected StageEncoder is not compatible

options.name: PrependMigrate
options.description: Spawns and runs shellcode in new process

options.name: PrependMigrateProc
options.description: Process to spawn and run shellcode in

options.name: EXITFUNC
options.description: Exit technique (Accepted: '', seh, thread, process, none)

options.name: StagerURILength
options.description: The URI length for the stager (at least 5 bytes)

options.name: StagerRetryCount
options.description: The number of times the stager should retry if the first connect fails

options.name: StagerRetryWait
options.description: Number of seconds to wait for the stager between reconnect attempts

options.name: HttpHostHeader
options.description: An optional value to use for the Host HTTP header

options.name: HttpCookie
options.description: An optional value to use for the Cookie HTTP header

options.name: HttpReferer
options.description: An optional value to use for the Referer HTTP header

options.name: HttpProxyHost
options.description: An optional proxy server IP address or hostname

options.name: HttpProxyPort
options.description: An optional proxy server port

options.name: HttpProxyUser
options.description: An optional proxy server username Max parameter length: 63 characters

options.name: HttpProxyPass
options.description: An optional proxy server password Max parameter length: 63 characters

options.name: HttpProxyType
options.description: The type of HTTP proxy (Accepted: HTTP, SOCKS)

options.name: HttpProxyIE
options.description: Enable use of IE proxy settings

options.name: LURI
options.description: The HTTP Path

options.name: ReverseListenerBindAddress
options.description: The specific IP address to bind to on the local system

options.name: OverrideRequestHost
options.description: Forces a specific host and port instead of using what the client requests, defaults to LHOST:LPORT

options.name: OverrideLHOST
options.description: When OverrideRequestHost is set, use this value as the host name for secondary requests

options.name: OverrideLPORT
options.description: When OverrideRequestHost is set, use this value as the port number for secondary requests

options.name: OverrideScheme
options.description: When OverrideRequestHost is set, use this value as the scheme for secondary requests, e.g http or https

options.name: HttpUserAgent
options.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like Gecko
options.description: The user-agent that the payload should use for communication Max parameter length: 255 characters

options.name: HttpServerName
options.description: The server header that the handler will send in response to requests

options.name: HttpUnknownRequestResponse
options.description: The returned HTML response body when the handler receives a request that is not from a payload

options.name: IgnoreUnknownPayloads
options.description: Whether to drop connections from payloads using unknown UUIDs

options.name: StagerVerifySSLCert
options.description: Whether to verify the SSL certificate hash in the handler

options.name: VNCPORT
options.description: The local port to use for the VNC proxy

options.name: VNCHOST
options.description: The local host to use for the VNC proxy

options.name: DisableCourtesyShell
options.description: Disables the Metasploit Courtesy shell

options.name: ViewOnly
options.description: Runs the viewer in view mode

options.name: AUTOVNC
options.description: Automatically launch VNC viewer if present

options.name: DisableSessionTracking
options.description: Disables the VNC payload from following the active session as users log in an out of the input desktop
